about.first_section_1: Sacith started its activity in 2004, focusing on the production of very high-tech components for air-massage systems. In a very short period Sacith has become the first supplier of air-system components for the most important Italian whirlpool brands.
about.first_section_2: In 2006, we produced the SACITRONIC, winning the challenge of realizing an electromechanical control for pumps, responding to safety regulations, without the need of electronic devices. SACITRONIC is covered by an International Patent.
about.second_section: In 2009, just after the Italian whirlpool components producer Aquajet closed its activity, Sacith took over a significant part of its moulds and patents, enlarging its range of products with a complete series of hydro-massage components and granting also a continuation of sales and support to the clients who used to buy from Aquajet. Passion for technical solutions is the spirit that is aiming this company and the satisfaction of clientsâ€™ special needs is our mission.
about.third_section_1: We are firmly convinced that good business relationships are based on four important points:
about.third_section_2: - Price, that is giving the chance of introducing a company and a product;
about.third_section_3: - Quality of the components, that is convincing the client to go on testing them;
about.third_section_4: - Service that a supplier must grant to satisfy special requests or to answer normal questions;
about.third_section_5: - Perseverance and mutual trust that are the ingredients for a long lasting relationship.
about.third_section_6: If you share our opinions and you are curious to test what we are offering, please, try and contact us!
